item.title: Before you deploy ...
item.dc:creator: ncdulo
item.description:
As a quick reminder -- before you go ahead and begin commiting anything to GitHub, there are a few other things you should handle first. Just a quick check before going live [insert thumbsup emoji]

  • Remove test posts

    • Alternatively, tidy them up. Make them ready for publish.

    • Pokemon image (Licensing?)

  • Remove remaining demo content

  • All around final check of all processes

    • Post creation

    • All links and pages working

    • Content is correct

    • Theme is nice
